review: 1010 fun funny fantastic

wow what a great pointandclick adventure this is it has the most wonderful hand drawn scenes which you just dont see these days the puzzles and dialogue were fun and the adventure is suitably long recommended

a little bit discworld a little bit monkey island a little bit bored of the rings simply put if you like fantasycomedy pointandclickadventure games then youll really like this hours of content no nonsensical puzzles utterly charming
its a nice well designed and slow game to play no hurry and no rush

i recommend this point and click adventure it has a lot of hints of other nerdy fandoms probably more than i could catch the voice actors were good and most of the time the voice and text matches not just long texts the length of the game was good and i the difficulty did not increased at the end even though i took a look at a walkthough a couple of times because point and click and walking and clicking and then forgetting something and so on a very nice game
this was really funny and chill adventure point and click game  loved all the characters  cant beliieve i found this game randomly  so glad i did  im definitely gonna play the other 2 games also
really nice game with good story voice acting and graphics puzzles are really easy so is ideal for beginners
amazing characters with equally amazing top notch voice actors the story is compelling and immersive a point and click adventure very funny great graphics and well worth every penny highly recommend

its a decent game with good throwbacks for point and click and fantasy games in general the humor is a little dated and at times feels like the writers are trying too hard to be funny not a bad game though
very engaging adventure game rich storyline good voice acting and importantly very captivating atmosphere the riddles are reasonably challenging and wellconstructed
brilliant game wish theyd do more

the graphical style might be offputting at first but this is a true adventure game there are a few places where the waiting for animation can be annoying and a few other places where the humor falls flat but overall it leaves a good taste in your mouth afterwards almost none of the puzzles are nonsensical i recommend to anyone who likes pointandclicks my favorite was the section with the group of undead
great game i miss these games
great game
a wonderful funny and immersive game the book of unwritten tales has clever puzzles a charming story and a fantasy world thats easy to get lost in its a must for adventure fans
it reminded me a lot of the old lucas arts and sierra online adventures
tedious click read click read click read click read click read
my favorite game
real fun experience 1010

nice pointnclick is your like lotr and similar good things also theres no redundant or repeated guessing with impossible combinations and the solutions are much obvious good game playing now tbout2 for some minutes and its exactly what you would expect from a pointnclick like this on modern graphics and gamepad support

the first unwritten tales is a good basis for understanding the story characters and world however even as someone who played the second game first i would still recommend it over this one the first game is still funny and entertaining with some good albeit frustrating puzzles at times i would recommend you give it a go

its one of my favorite pointclick games i love how it combines humor with fantasy adventure story graphics are good music and sound effects are perfect mechanics are simple at some points it gets a little challenging but overall its easy to progress the story and you never get bored if you like comedy medieval fantasy era and pointclick games then its a must to play it
funny point and click games with lots of references to other games
super cute game  love it
a fun romp through the fantasy genre with some wit and unexpected twists very enjoyable
fun game

solid adventure games with fun characters and good writing the story is unapologetically clich and theres something comfy and cozy about the atmosphere got soft locked a couple times so make sure you use a few different save slots
lovely game
eghh cute enuf but not interesting to really try to puzzle out  i ended up just going straight thru with a walkthru but still getting distracted by like house cleaning

great classic point and click adventure i loved the medieval fantasy setting mostly used on rpg games it works really well as an adventure game the story and characters are well written i enjoyed the plot and the jokes about the fantasy genre and pop culture in general it maybe is in the long i think some puzzles couldve had less steps and make the game a bunch of hours shorter but anyway it was a pretty good and fun experience
nice game got a few laughs out of it
fun

fantastic thats the word id use to describe this game while i admitt a lot of the puzzels arent super high quality it more makes up for it with its phenomenoal art dirrection and good story which is really well written on top of a really good soundtrack

this game somehow ended up in my steam library as soon as i found out it was a point and click game i knew it wasnt my cup of tea anyway ill give it positive rating it looks decent enough for those who like this genre i suppose voice acting and music is pretty good

i think the team gave up on this game halfway through and so did i finishing this game after the introduction of nate felt like having my skin being pulled off of me very slowly while also being doused in corrosive acid i desperately looked for the moment the game would even attempt to redeem itself up to the very end it did not the ending was just insult to injury it felt so lazy and rushed major waste of time
will keep you on your toes
proper classic point and click

old fashioned game play fun story line and a nice assortment of characters the artwork was retro and fun lots of humor and it is challenging to figure out what to do i cheated a bit with a walk through after trying to figure things out on my own first i figured most of it out without the walk through very entertaining game
really engaging and wholesome game

one of the best point and click games ive ever played and lots of easter eggs from movies and games xd very chill and funny all the way the ending was a bit disappointing considering but for some reason almost every point and click game i played was like that but still worth it
nice lighthearted pointnclick quest
its a great quest

its pretty good the game is quite old so a lot of the formatting of the game is pretty outdated but theres some nice writing and sets up a pretty intriguing world that i hope they continue to expand upon

this game is funnycrude and cute at the same time  i like the fact that you have to go to multiple locations in order to find solutions to the problems there are moments where you think you are done having to visit a location but either new items or dialogue appear when you go there   the need to switch back and forth between the three characters makes the game a little more challenging but in a good way
very charming game  itll keep you hooked from the very second youre introduced to the first character  very fun puzzles albeit a bit hard to solve at times overall a great experience
really fun point and click game with a couple of nice puzzles and really fun dialogue after playing it i immediately bought the book of unwritten tales 2  warmly recommended
very nice pointandclick adventure with the atmosphere of games as monkey island simon the sorcerer i enjoyed it very much
fun and has some nice mechanics
had a nice time
this games writing is nothing short of amazing and the game works flawlessly on steam deck
charming game  writers have a great sense of humor

i enjoyed this a lot the puzzles are good brainteasers and make you hunt every corner for answers but dont require any moon logic provided youve paid attention to the dialogue details only mentioned in passing can sometimes prove important some of the humour made me roll my eyes but there was also plenty that made me laugh and the story references and subverts  and satirises  fantasy tropes galore for me a good balance between chilled and challenging

solid point and click adventure good story enjoyable humor and 4th wall breaks the game doesnt really give any direct hints but you can have the click points displayed to keep you on track with what you havent tried yet overall very enjoyable game
i do recommend this game but it doesnt save so it is pointless to play until that gets fixed
great trailer graphically the game is great there is a lot of problem solving and each area could take around a half hour or so

this game is boring the characters move waaaaaay too slow and there are annoying nonskippable mini games which should be there in a point and click adventure to begin with of which one doesnt work because of technical issues its so bad the developers provide a savegame to pass that mini game the save game makes your game crash when you load it

a nice point  click adventure perfect for the more casual adventurer as it does not have a lot of the far fetched puzzles as in some pc games graphics are good all text is also spoken a good length it has taken me almost 20 hours to complete as it is a bit easier youll advance in a nice pase through the chapters to keep it interesting and fun playing this game was a very  enjoyable experience
enjoyable point and click humorous and the puzzles were fun
awesome old school adventure got me over thinking and under thinking and frustrated at different times bloody good adventure game
fantastic comedy point and click a real treat
quite enjoyable the ending was a little abrupt tho
nice voice acting and dialogvery hilarious enjoyable to play

standard pointandclick adventure game decent 3d animations better than i thought it was going to be ive enjoyed it so far there are some really annoying issues with the sound volume in places but apart from that it seems good

funny hilarious creative and make us feel that we are living a dream a masterpiece of pointclick that isnt boring for the fact that the combination of objects and scenario areas are not infinite as all other games of the same genre are
this is part of a series of long narrative games that ends smack in the middle of the narrative at the end of game 2   youll never find out how the damn thing ends  so dont start
much better and longer that i expected loved the characters logical puzzles pretty satisfied
like history level of difficulty dont like long dialogs necessary to go through

lighthearted fantasy humor pointandclick puzzles are reasonable  and although i did get stuck a couple of time in most cases this was of my own accord story is not too complex and little bit on the nose but well worth your money
nice tongue and cheek fantasy adventure reminiscent of the monkey island games
i liked the idea and basic story of the game but the execution and style did not convince me
one of the best pointclick adventure games ive ever played fun humorous and very nice looking
great game

i absolutely love this game up there with some of the classic point and click adventure games for me great humour storyline art and puzzles i was particularly impressed with the playtime of this game i am gutted to hear there are no updates about finishing the series

yes i like this one good puzzles engaging story and nice bright graphics and art work runs fine on laptop it does make the cpu fans run at max but no dramas its nice to hear english spoken for a change and some neat jokes as well thrown in one of the trials is very difficult but there is a simple fix on steam so you can jump it if it is getting tedious  dont bother with the second instalment it seems to written for a young child not impressed
this game is brilliant even for its age it did aged well enough not my main game style so went with bad expectations and got a pleasent suprise should had played it sooner

i love a good pointandclick adventure game and this series is high on my list of favorites alongside discworld some of the puzzles had me reaching for a walkthrough and a poorly designed quicktime minigame almost had me rage quit but overall still great
honestly i was okay with this until the paladin character that is uncomfortable af
played it  finished it  liked it a lot  probably going to play it again in a few years after i have forgotten the solutions to all the puzzles
very enjoyable game and series
an impressively entertaining witty good game for one that at first glance looked like it was manufactured in a cereal box factory
a very slow point  click game has some comedy elements but its not all funny
fun little adventure
hilarious and full of references puzzles are pretty doable without the help of a guide which you cant say for other point and clicks

cheesy dialogue and puzzles that are challenging enough to stay interested and complete the game its a good time for any point and click fan definitely classic 90s game style and you dont need crazy specs to play it
this game is excellent and hilarious i recommend it to everyone

i really loved this game the puzzles were great except one which i wont mention but the humor is something i think everyone that likes point and click games will find relatable and very funny   thank you to the developer king art
clever and ridiculous funny and engaging all the way
probably one of my favourite games ever if your a big fan of point and click adventures this one is a must play funny endearing and shockingly unrated     nate sucks though

absolutely delightful game  some puzzles are a bit frustrating  but the story is well done graphics as well surprisingly funny bits and rather unique puzzles and challenges thoroughly enjoying this one

wow what an astonishing little puzzle gamestory adventure the voice acting the puzzles the story the art and sound was just so well done oftentimes the puzzles were difficult to work out lots of backtracking trying to see what fit next but the endingi wont spoil it but it was so well worked out
wonderful game full with humour and a great story great puzzles and great soundtrack highly recommended

this is buggy as all get out  it screws up whatsapp and the steam app when i come out of it whatsapp just needs resizing but the steam app now isnt working  its also got a fiddly interface im going to see if i can return it
a wonderful adventure point and click game i just finished the last bits so im going to start on part 2 hehe
it reminds me of the old lucas arts adventure games or kings quest games from the humor and the gameplay i have been hooked
funny and somewhat of a challenge
loved this game was very cute and funny if you like other point and click puzzle games you will like this one

beautiful game lovable characters and bringing back the old point and click genre as if it never disappeared i cant believe just how enjoyable it is to find a game which pays homage to the old school pc games but also brings modern changes with it for easy game play the sarcasm throughout is brilliant too a true adventure plenty of story but not too much and difficult enough to keep your attention too couldnt ask for more

gosh this is such a fantastically hilarious and adventurous story and i would recommend it a thousand times over very rarely do i have such resoundingly positive feelings toward a game but i found myself pausing at every turn to turn around and update my housemates on the latest bizarre update that this game gifted me by the end they were as invested as i was
if youre into casual point and clicks with wit story line drama romance laughs this is for you older still has good bones

great game  a spoof on the genre  it made me laugh and i enjoyed the puzzles  the solutions were not the obvious in most cases which is what a game should be  the only part i did not like was the rain dance i thought i would never get it  now on to the next one
a great point and click adventure the puzzles arent too hard but challanging enough there are tons jokes and referances to nerd culture a must buy for genre lovers
hilarious best point and click ive played in a long time
usually i dont like these kind of games but i actually enjoy playing the book of unwritten tales i dont know why i enjoy it so much but when im bored ill play for hours i guess it just passes time
wonderful

this game is absolutely gorgeous i love every character in the story the puzzles are well done and from easy to challenging ones  pros   unique storyline   music is beautiful   gameplay   voice acting
enjoyed every second i spend on the game music alone is worth the price
beautiful point and click adventure if you look for adventures that is one of the right answers
classic and adventure puzzling game it doesnt aged much and still fun to play i had lots of laugh in every selection of interaction feels short yet satisfying
aged pretty well looks very good and the humour is great puzzles are a bit easy but creative enough imo
fun game that is not too complicated a great game that i can enjoy along with my 1st grader

i really loved playing this game  the graphics are so colorful and beautiful  the game play was easy and the puzzles were thought provoking  i liked the game so much i immediately purchased the other two
